segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are engaged in a clandestine operation near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is teetering precariously on a wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, grabbing cookies from a jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister stands nearby, with her hand outstretched, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together, a perfect little team of cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so worried he'll fall and get hurt, or break some dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman at the sink remains completely oblivious to their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate, completely lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s astonishing how unaware she is of everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These children are taking quite a risk for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a minefield of impending minor disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent scheme is so delightful despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
